subject: Baseball
Steroids
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Rob Manfred, a tough-on-drugs official under Bud Selig, has been met with a flurry of positive tests to begin his first season as Selig’s successor.
snippet: Rob Manfred, a tough-on-drugs official under Bud Selig, has been met with a flurry of positive tests to begin his first season as Selig’s successor.
